abstract: Adding a social feature to the Bing search engine is aimed at sharpening the competition with Google.
snippet: Adding a social feature to the Bing search engine is aimed at sharpening the competition with Google.
lead_paragraph: Facebook and Microsoft announced a partnership on Wednesday that will give the results on Microsoft’s Bing search engine a social twist  and could help both companies compete against a common adversary, Google.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Bing Gets a Social Lift From Facebook
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Bing Gets Social Lift From Facebook

abstract: Facebook and Microsoft announced a partnership that would give the results on Microsoft’s Bing search engine a social twist — and could help both companies compete against a common adversary, Google.
snippet: Facebook and Microsoft announced a partnership that would give the results on Microsoft’s Bing search engine a social twist — and could help both companies compete against a common adversary, Google.
lead_paragraph: Facebook and Microsoft announced a partnership on Wednesday that would give the results on Microsoft’s Bing search engine a social twist — and could help both companies compete against a common adversary, Google.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Bing Deepens Friendship With Facebook

abstract: Yahoo has been meeting with Goldman Sachs in case it receives an offer. That is the same banking adviser that led Yahoo to one of its greatest missteps in its history in spurning Microsoft.
snippet: Yahoo has been meeting with Goldman Sachs in case it receives an offer. That is the same banking adviser that led Yahoo to one of its greatest missteps in its history in spurning Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo, which is reportedly the target — or not — of a potential takeover by AOL and private-equity firms, has been holding meetings with its bankers to prepare itself in the event it receives an offer, people close to the company said.

headline.main: An Odd Couple: Yahoo and Goldman
